name: The Sunset Sessions - SUNSET logo zip hoodie (multi colors)
description:
The Sunset Sessions Zip Hoodie feat. "Sunset" logo graphic—special dual (front & back) 3-ink screen on a tri-blend hoodie. Small 3" screen featured on front right chest, as well as full large logo on backside 

Hand Screened with pure California love right in San Francisco on an American Apparel slim fitting unisex tri-blend full zip hoodie

This garment is double-sided with very soft French Terry lining and a Cotton/Poly/Rayon Fleece shell to better hold up through washing machines and heat.


▲ Tri-Blend tee (50% Polyester / 25% Ring-Spun Cotton / 25% Rayon) construction
▲ Metal zipper
▲ Hooded with white Polyester drawcord
▲ sizes: XS - XL (*NOTE: Unisex size – women may prefer to order one size smaller for a slim fit)
▲ colors: Tri-Oatmeal, Tri-Blue, Tri-Black
▲ Made and screened in California, USA




*PLEASE NOTE: This is a special SEASONAL HOLIDAY PREVIEW ITEM ONLY AVAILABLE for purchase until DEC 8—and will be shipping outbound  from California during DEC 16th-18th via USPS PRIORITY MAIL (offering FREE S&H to U.S. addresses.) Thank you in advance for understanding

name: Vintage 70s Camo Army Jacket - customized with pyramid studs » Women's S-L or Men's S-L
description:
Each one of The Sunset Sessions' vintage Army military jackets are custom studded by hand and available in both U.S. WOMENS and MENS sizes: small, medium or large.

This particular limited edition is made from a 1970s series of good/excellent quality vintage original U.S. Army field shirt jacket stock.

This jacket studded design consists of 2 rows of studs across the tops of each of the 4 front pockets, hand-studded with silver(nickel-plated and brass) pyramid studs.

▲ Original heavy cotton 1970's vintage original U.S. Army field shirt jacket
▲ Featuring amazing custom hand-applied SILVER(nickel-plated) pyramid studs or all BRASS pyramid studs.
▲ available in WOMENS or MENS Small, Medium or Large
▲ Available in one original jungle CAMO (brown, grey, black, forest green pattern) color
▲ great/excellent vintage condition; there are no holes, tears, stains or fading on exterior or interior of jacket.


*Note: Model pictured in jacket images is 5'7" - wearing a WOMEN's SMALL 
(These jackets tend to run ONE SIZE LARGER than standard shirt/jacket sizes because they are official military jackets meant for active duty)

*PLEASE NOTE: All of The Sunset Sessions handmade vintage fashions are custom and made-to-order, so please allow 7 days from date of purchase in shop until outbound shipment date. THANK YOU in advance for understanding

name: Vintage 70s Camo Army Jacket - customized w/ crystal studs » Women's S-L
description:
Each one of The Sunset Sessions' vintage Army military jackets are custom studded by hand and available in both U.S. WOMENS sizes: small, medium or large.

This particular limited edition is made from a 1970s series of good/excellent quality vintage original U.S. Army field shirt jacket stock.

This jacket studded design consists of 2 rows of studs across the tops of each of the 4 front pockets, hand-studded with round studs with/ white crystal studs. 

▲ Original heavy cotton 1970's vintage original U.S. Army field shirt jacket
▲ Featuring amazing custom hand-applied studded options: SILVER round studs with/ white crystal studs.
▲ available in WOMENS or MENS Small, Medium or Large
▲ Available in one original jungle CAMO (brown, grey, black, forest green pattern) color
▲ great/excellent vintage condition; there are no holes, tears, stains or fading on exterior or interior of jacket.


*Note: Model pictured in jacket images is 5'8" - wearing a WOMEN's SMALL 
(These jackets tend to run ONE SIZE LARGER than standard shirt/jacket sizes because they are official military jackets meant for active duty)

*PLEASE NOTE: All of The Sunset Sessions handmade vintage fashions are custom and made-to-order, so please allow 7 days from date of purchase in shop until outbound shipment date. THANK YOU in advance for understanding

name: Vintage 1970s Army Shirt Jacket - customized by The Sunset Sessions » Men's S-L or Women's M-XL
description:
Each one of The Sunset Sessions' vintage military jackets are custom studded by hand and available in MENS' sizes: small, medium or large in two studded options: SILVER pyramid studs or BRASS pyramid studs.

This particular limited edition is made from a 1970s series of good/excellent quality vintage original German Army Moleskin field shirt jacket stock.

This jacket studded design consists of a row of pyramid studs across the tops of each of the 2 front pockets, as well as one row across the entirety of the back shoulder stitch.

Please specify in order if you would like studded pyramids in SILVER or BRASS finish.

▲ Original Moleskin soft cotton 1970's vintage original German Army field shirt jacket
▲ Featuring amazing custom decorative silver or brass stud detailing on dual pockets at top of jacket front and on backside
▲ available in MEN's Small, Medium or Large
▲ Available in one original drab GREEN/GREY color
▲ great/excellent vintage condition; there are no holes, tears, stains or fading on exterior or interior of jacket.

*Note: Model pictured in jacket images is 5'8" - wearing a Men's Small

*PLEASE NOTE: All of The Sunset Sessions handmade vintage fashions are custom and made-to-order, so please allow 7 days from date of purchase in shop until outbound shipment date. THANK YOU in advance for understanding

STOCK SIZES:

SMALL:
ARMPIT to ARMPIT — 21”  (53cm)
ARM LENGTH — 20” (51cm)
TOTAL LENGTH — 30” (76cm)

MEDIUM:
ARMPIT to ARMPIT — 23” (59cm)
ARM LENGTH — 19.5” (50cm)
TOTAL LENGTH — 32.5” (82.5cm)

LARGE:
ARMPIT to ARMPIT — 24.5” (62cm)
ARM LENGTH — 19.75” (50cm)
TOTAL LENGTH — 31” (79cm)

name: Vintage 1950s Military Fatigue Jacket - customized by The Sunset Sessions » Women's Sm-Med
description:
Each one of The Sunset Sessions' vintage Military jackets are custom studded by hand. This style is available in U.S. WOMENS sizes: small, medium, and in studded options: SILVER round studs with/ white crystal studs, all SILVER pyramid studs or all BRASS pyramid studs.

This particular limited edition is made from a 1950s series of good/excellent quality, limited-edition of vintage original European military fatigue shirt jacket deadstock.

This jacket studded design consists of 3 rows of studs across the tops of both of the front pockets.

▲ Original soft, heavy cotton 1950's vintage original military fatigue shirt jacket
▲ Featuring amazing custom hand-applied studded options: SILVER round studs with/ white crystal studs, all SILVER pyramid studs or all BRASS pyramid studs.
▲ available in WOMENS Small or Medium
▲ Available in one original olive/drab grey color
▲ great/excellent vintage condition; there are no holes, tears, stains or fading on exterior or interior of jacket.

Please specify in order which of the below stud finish options you prefer:
—SILVER round studs with/ white crystal studs
—all SILVER pyramid studs
—all BRASS pyramid studs.


*Note: Model pictured in jacket images is 5'8" - wearing a WOMEN's SMALL (these particular jackets have a pretty standardized size chart fit)

*PLEASE NOTE: All of The Sunset Sessions handmade vintage fashions are custom and made-to-order, so please allow 7 days from date of purchase in shop until outbound shipment date. THANK YOU in advance for understanding

name: 'The Bolinas' Reversible Leather & Suede Vintage Cuff handmade by The Sunset Sessions
description:
The Bolinas is a wide leather cuff design which has been spliced into 7 smaller individual bands through the midsection of the band; creating a visually eye-catching accessory but with a softer and more delicate design aesthetic. This particular version is designed to be reversible—and can be worn with either the smooth leather or textured suede finish side facing outwards.

Each one of The Sunset Sessions' leather cuffs are made by hand from recycled vintage leather jackets and fully customized to provide a completely unique design—ensuring that no two cuffs are ever exactly the same.

This particular limited edition is made from a 1980s leather jacket of approx. 7mm gauge (thickness.)

'The Bolinas' design consists of a rectangular 3" wide x 8" long solid band which is adored with 7 rows of small silver(nickel plated tone) flat round studs. This design is a very solid leather cuff with some stretch (but is a little more delicate in center with the thin spliced strands) and makes quite an eye-catching statement.

The leather itself comes available in natural medium brown leather,  cherry red, or black.

Closure includes a double-set of two nickel-plated snaps, which allows for varying wrist circumferences for both men and women. 


*PLEASE NOTE: All of The Sunset Sessions handmade vintage leather cuffs are custom and made-to-order, so please allow 7 days from date of purchase in shop until outbound shipment date. THANK YOU in advance for understanding

name: Vintage 60s authentic custom Boho style fringe leather jackets » (Temp out; avail for backorder)
description:
Authentic original vintage 1960s custom 100% heavyweight suede leather fringe jackets (with or without nylon lining interior.) The Sunset Sessions stocks these authentic custom fringe jackets whenever available, and only carries excellent condition, authentic original designs, featuring amazing authentic decorative fringe detailing on front chest and rear of jackets.

*This is a high-demand item which is consistently avail in shop whenever available. If we don't have these jackets currently in stock, you may send us an email to place priority order. We only stock items with full color vibrancy, clean in color; no holes or stains whatsoever; in excellent condition.

name: Special spcaLA benefit - Leather Custom Cuff handmade by The Sunset Sessions
description:
'The Rockaway' model is the first and original design in The Sunset Sessions' vintage leather custom cuff collection, and this particular design is a very special creation which also helps benefit the spcaLA (Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals Los Angeles.)

$5 from every sale of this special leather cuff design will be donated directly to the spcaLA.

Each one of The Sunset Sessions' leather cuffs are made by hand and fully customized to provide a completely unique design—ensuring that no two cuffs are ever exactly the same.

This particular limited edition is made from a contemporary cow skin of approx. 7mm gauge (thickness) and hand-painted with leopard print design.

'The Rockaway' design consists of a rectangular 2" wide x 8" long band which is spliced into three smaller bands through the midsection of the band. This design is a solid durable cuff which gives the illusion that one is wearing a collection of three smaller bands.

Each of the the bands are adorned with decorative square nickel-plated pyramid studs—both SILVER or GOLD studs are available.

Closure includes a double-set of nickel-plated (silver or gold) snaps, which allows for varying wrist circumferences for both men and women.

*IMPORTANT: When ordering cuff(s), PLEASE CLICK whether you'd prefer
a SILVER or GOLD studded cuff

*PLEASE NOTE: All of The Sunset Sessions handmade vintage leather cuffs are custom and made-to-order, so please allow 7 days from date of purchase in shop until outbound shipment date. THANK YOU in advance for understanding

name: 'The Bolinas' w/ Brass Studs - Vintage Leather Cuff handmade by The Sunset Sessions
description:
The Bolinas is a wide leather cuff design which has been spliced into 7 smaller individual bands through the midsection of the band; creating a visually eye-catching accessory but with a softer and more delicate design aesthetic.

Each one of The Sunset Sessions' leather cuffs are made by hand from recycled vintage leather jackets and fully customized to provide a completely unique design—ensuring that no two cuffs are ever exactly the same.

This particular limited edition is made from a 1960s leather jacket of approx. 7mm gauge (thickness.)

'The Bolinas' design consists of a rectangular 3" wide x 8" long solid band which is adored with 7 rows of small brass(dark gold tone) round studs. This design is a very solid leather cuff with some stretch (but is a little more delicate in center with the thin spliced strands) and makes quite an eye-catching statement.

This cuff features a smooth leather outfacing finish, and the leather itself comes available in natural light brown leather color or can be dyed(with 100% all-natural, non-toxic dye) in: dark brown, cherry red, black or charcoal grey.

Closure includes a double-set of two nickel-plated snaps, which allows for varying wrist circumferences for both men and women. 


*PLEASE NOTE: All of The Sunset Sessions handmade vintage leather cuffs are custom and made-to-order, so please allow 7 days from date of purchase in shop until outbound shipment date. THANK YOU in advance for understanding

name: 'The Hook' w/ Large Studs - Vintage Leather Cuff handmade by The Sunset Sessions
description:
The Hook is an oversized, wide leather cuff design which packs a bit of a punch with a more bold-yet stylized-design aesthetic.

Each one of The Sunset Sessions' leather cuffs are made by hand from recycled vintage leather jackets and fully customized to provide a completely unique design—ensuring that no two cuffs are ever exactly the same.

This particular limited edition is made from a 1970s leather jacket of approx. 8-9mm gauge (thickness.)

'The Hook' design consists of a rectangular 3.5" wide x 8" long solid band which is adored with 7 rows of large brass(dark gold tone) or nickel-plated(silver tone) round studs. This design is a very solid durable cuff and makes quite an eye-catching statement. 

The cuffs are available in either smooth leather or textured suede as an outfacing finish, and the leather itself comes available in natural light brown leather color or can be dyed(with 100% all-natural, non-toxic dye) in: dark brown, cherry red, black or charcoal grey.

Closure includes a double-set of three nickel-plated snaps, which allows for varying wrist circumferences for both men and women. (On smaller wrists, it can give the illusion of a bracelet—whereas more of a fitted cuff on larger wrists.)

*IMPORTANT: When ordering cuff(s), PLEASE SPECIFY if you'd prefer 
a smooth leather or textured suede cuff

*PLEASE NOTE: All of The Sunset Sessions handmade vintage leather cuffs are custom and made-to-order, so please allow 7 days from date of purchase in shop until outbound shipment date. THANK YOU in advance for understanding
